entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 30
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS AROUND 50
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
